channel.title: I just ran into the weirdest glitch
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "I just ran into the weirdest glitch" - Wondering if I'm the only one

item.title: I just ran into the weirdest glitch
item.content:encoded:
I ran into this really weird glitch, and I'm wondering if it's just me or something.

I logged in a minute ago, to check my village and stuff(I had no more stamina), and it said "billy club" right under my name. I when to my village and went back, still there. I had no affect from it(Like I never ad it), but it was there, right in front of me. So I logged off and logged back on, and it wasn't there o.O

Did this happen to anyone else? And what could of caused this?
